text: Bisbasira yena bisbasidera bada diye abisbasidera bandhurupe grahana na kare. Ara ye emana karabe allahâ€Œra kacha theke kono kichu'i thakabe na, tabe yadi tomara tadera theke satarkata sbarupa husiyamra hate ca'o. Ara allah tomadera tamra sanbandhe sabadhana karechena, ara allahâ€Œra dike'i sesa gati.
